title: U.S. Can Levy Tariffs on EU Exports Over Airbus, WTO Says
text:
BRUSSELS—The U.S. is entitled to levy tariffs on $7.5 billion of exports from the European Union over the bloc’s subsidies to Airbus SE, the World Trade Organization said, potentially opening up a new front in the Trump administration’s global trade fight.

The WTO’s decision on Wednesday concludes part of a 15-year battle over support programs for aircraft makers Airbus and Boeing Co. The WTO will rule on a separate EU case against U.S. subsidies to Boeing, also previously deemed illegal, in the first half of next year, determining...
description: The U.S. is entitled to levy tariffs on $7.5 billion of exports from the European Union over the bloc’s subsidies to Airbus, the WTO said, potentially opening a new front in Trump’s global trade fight.
